title: I Donâ€™t Want To Miss A Thing
lyrics:
[intro] (D)
I could (D)stay awake (A)just to hear you (Bm)breathing
Watch you (G)smile while you are (D)sleeping
While you are (Em)far away and (A)dreaming
I could (D)spend my life (A)in this sweet (Bm) surrender
I could (G)stay lost in this (D)moment for-(A)ever
Every moment (G)spent with (D)you is a moment I (A)treasure

[chorus]
(D) I don't wanna (A)close my eyes
(Em) I don't wanna fall asleep
Cause I (G)miss you baby
And I (A)don't wanna miss a thing
(D) Cause even when I (A)dream of you
(Em) The sweetest dream will never do
I still (G)miss you baby
And I (A)don't wanna miss a thing
(D) (A) (G) (G-stop)

Lying (D)close to you (A)feeling your heart (Bm) beating
And I (G)wondering what you are (D)dreaming
Wondering (Em)if it's me you are (A)seeing
Then I (D)kiss your eyes and (A)thank God we're to(Bm)gether
I just want to (G)stay with you (D) in this moment for-(A)ever, forever and ever

[chorus]
(D) I don't wanna (A)close my eyes
(Em) I don't wanna fall asleep
Cause I (G)miss you baby
And I (A)don't wanna miss a thing
(D) Cause even when I (A)dream of you
(Em) The sweetest dream will never do
I still (G)miss you baby
And I (A)don't wanna miss a thing

[bridge]
(D) And I don't wanna (C)miss one smile
I don't wanna (G)miss one kiss
I just want to (Bb)be with you right here with you
(F)Just like this
I just want to (C)hold you close
I feel your heart so (G)close to mine
And just (Dm)stay here in this moment
For all the (Asus4)rest of time, (A)yeah (yeah), yeah (yeah), yeeeaaah

[chorus]
(D) I don't wanna (A)close my eyes
(Em) I don't wanna fall asleep
Cause I (G)miss you baby
And I (A)don't wanna miss a thing
(D) Cause even when I (A)dream of you
(Em) The sweetest dream will never do
I still (G)miss you baby
And I (A)don't wanna miss a thing

[chorus again !]
(D) I don't wanna (A)close my eyes
(Em) I don't wanna fall asleep
Cause I (G)miss you baby
And I (A)don't wanna miss a thing
(D) Cause even when I (A)dream of you
(Em) The sweetest dream will never do
I still (G)miss you baby
And I (A)don't wanna miss a thing
(D) (A) (G) (Gm) 
(D) [end]
